participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and imaginative, with a playful spirit and a love for creativity.
participant_1.background: I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest. I'm originally from London, England. If I were to be reincarnated, I would want to come back as a hippopotamus. I am a bartender who enjoys a good time with my friends. I love to play pretend and live out my fantasies in the LARP world.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adventurous, always eager to explore new places and meet new people.
participant_2.background: I am not sure what my family members do for a living. Traveling and making friends is something I find delightful. I play for the Philadelphia Eagles. I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer. I go running a lot.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! How about you?
I am doing great, thanks for asking! I am from London, England. What about you?
I am originally from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. But I have lived in a lot of different places.
Oh wow! That sounds interesting. Have you always loved traveling?
I have always enjoyed traveling, yes. And I love making new friends in different places.
That is great! I am not very good at making new friends.
Oh, that is too bad. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play pretend and live out my fantasies in the LARP world.
LARP stands for live action role playing. It is like a game, but you actually act out the story.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never heard of it before.
It is! You should try it sometime.
